questions.question: A father is twice as old as his son. If the sum of their ages is 72, how old is the son?

questions.question: A man is 4 times as old as his son. After 5 years, he will be three times as old. Find the son's current age.
questions.subject: math

questions.question: The difference between the ages of two sisters is 6 years. If the sum of their ages is 30, what is the age of the younger sister?
questions.subject: math
